extension.summary: An off-the-cuff Video Blog about Electronics Engineering, for engineers, hobbyists, enthusiasts, hackers and Makers.
extension.description: NO SCRIPT, NO FEAR, ALL OPINION[CR]An off-the-cuff Video Blog about Electronics Engineering, for engineers, hobbyists, enthusiasts, hackers and Makers.[CR]Hosted by Dave Jones from Sydney Australia.
